alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 2:29AM EST until February 20 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Major flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 31.0 feet, Major flooding occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:15 AM EST Sunday the stage was 30.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:15 AM EST Sunday was 31.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 14.4 feet Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 30.3 feet on 03/06/2015. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. The next statement will be issued 11 AM EST.
